text: Miguel de Oliveira (September 30, 1947 – October 15, 2021) was a Brazilian middleweight boxer. De Oliveira was born in Sao Paulo, Brazil. He became a pro in 1968, and on May 7, 1975 he won the Vacant WBC Light Middleweight Title. He died from pancreatic cancer on October 15, 2021, at the age of 74.Morre, aos 74 anos, Miguel de Oliveira, campeão mundial de boxe em 1975 ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Brazilian boxers Category:Sportspeople from São Paulo
title: Miguel de Oliveira
